summary: HAD PRIOR ISSUES REGARDING BRAKING; NOW THE ABS LIGHT CAME/STAYS ON AND WAS ADVISED BY THE GM SERVICE MANAGER THAT I AM STUCK WITH THE 995.00 BILL IF I CHOOSE TO HAVE IT REPAIRED/REPLACED, OTHERWISE I WOULD HAVE TO LIVE WITH IT SINCE "IT IS NOT A SAFETY ISSUE."  IT SEEMS THAT I AM NOT THE ONLY ONE.  *NLM
